title: 49N DLX Security Skewers, Black
description:
Nine out of ten experts agree: having two wheels and a seat on your bicycle makes for much more comfortable riding experience. But, when you lock your bike up on the streets of Toronto or any modern metropolis without the right kind of security, those key items can mysteriously go missing, never to be heard from again.

We have an easy solution to the problem in the form of the 49N Anti-Theft Skewer set. The skewers replace the standard quick-release levers found on many bikes, and slot into the seat post clamp, keeping everything intact so you can get where you need to go. Using a specially shaped key these cannot be opened using standard Allen keys.

  • Anti-theft wheel skewers
  • 3-piece kit to secure both wheels and seat post
  • Front: 133 mm / Rear: 169 mm
  • Seat post: M6 x 45 mm
  • Includes 1 key
  • Black
specs: 3-piece kit to secure both wheels and seat post

title: Abus, 440A Alarm, U-Lock, Key,12mm, Black
description:
A lock is good; a lock with an alarm system is even better. With 100 decibels, the 440A padlock will send every thief running.

We protect our most valuable possessions with an alarm system. So why not our bike? Our padlock 440 Alarm is equipped with the proven 3D Position Detection System, which registers even the smallest movement. If a thief tampers with your bicycle, the lock sounds the alarm immediately. And at a volume that discourages: 100 decibels is as loud as a circular saw and can therefore be heard from afar. An alarm like that will scare off any bike thief.

title: Abus, Ultra 410, Long U-lock
description:
The Ultra Mini 410 U-Lock is compact and combines high-quality materials with intelligent locking technology.

Thieves will have a hard time trying to make off with your bike: The Ultra Mini 410 U-Lock just can’t be broken! What features does it have to protect against theft? A 12mm thick rounded shackle which is made of specially hardened steel – just like the body and structural parts of the locking mechanism. Combined with a high-quality locking cylinder which offers superb protection against tampering such as picking thanks to “double locking”, the Ultra Mini 410 U-Lock is a reliable companion when you are out on your high-end bicycle. The lock is “Made in Germany” and passed the ice spray test with flying colours.

title: Ultra 410 U-Lock
description:
Ultra 410 D Bike Lock 
Featuring a simple, strong and attractive design, the new Ultra 410 is the ideal entry level D-lock and complements the Super Ultimate and Ultimate line-up. Its simple design conceals a number of high-tech advancements in security including a new double layered key with decoy cuttings and a cylinder with special wafers, which make this lock virtually impossible to pick with conventional methods. Every variant is Sold Secure Silver certified.
The 12mm thick double bolted, hardened steel shackle extends all the way through the lock body providing excellent protection against cutting and torsion attacks in a simple yet innovative design.
The Ultra 410 uses a very easy to mount, rattle-free frame bracket and comes in a full range of mini and standard sizes, with or without additional extension cables.

title: Ultimate, U-Lock, 420
description:
COMPACT, MASSIVE AND SECURE

The Ultimate 420 radiates a feeling of security simply through its appearance.

There are locks and there is the Ultimate 420. If you are looking for a shackle lock that will deter potential thieves just by looking at it, then you don't have to look far. Thirteen millimetres of hardened special steel and aggressive colouring make it immediately clear to any bicycle thief that he has no chance here.

At the same time, the Ultimate 420 is so compact that you can easily stow it away. It finds its place in every backpack and bag and is therefore always with you when you need to secure your valuable bicycle.

title: Granit Plus 640
description:
LIGHTWEIGHT YET HIGHLY EFFECTIVE PROTECTION AGAINST THEFT

Bad news for thieves: the GRANIT™ Plus 640 U-Lock offers superb protection against theft despite its diminutive weight

If you feel that every gram matters when you're buying a new bike, the wrong bike lock can play havoc with your calculations. But not the GRANIT™ Plus 640 U-Lock! This lightweight companion weighs in at a mere 860 g, making it the perfect choice if you occasionally have to leave your bike in locations such as railway stations where the risk of theft is high. Intelligent technologies such as the picking-resistant Plus disc cylinder with automatic cover and Double Locking provide a high level of protection against manipulation. The superior quality standard of the GRANIT™ Plus 640 U-Lock has been recognised in a great many different tests, with seals of approval awarded by OSIMZ (Russia) and test institutes in Finland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway and the United Kingdom.

title: Bordo Alarm 6000- Foldable lock
description:
The Sound of Security

The Bordo Alarm takes the security of the Bordo 6000 to the next level with the inclusion of a 100dB intelligent alarm system. ABUS is not new to alarm lock technology having produced motorcycle disc alarm locks for over ten years. The alarm is designed to not prematurely activate, allowing for movements that might happen while a bike is locked in tight quarters. Continued movements will set off the alarm for 15 seconds and will repeat until movement stops. Thanks to the patent pending “intelligent transport position”, activation is also avoided during transportation. The battery and activity status is displayed by means of acoustic signals giving the owner ample notice if a battery replacement is needed.

title: Ass Savers, BOW Edition
description:
Your ass's best friend.

The Ass Saver Original is our third generation foldable mudguard. Proven and tested in the field, it's a simple solution to the annoying brown stripe down the back of your pants.

The new and much improved Ass Saver is compatible with almost every standard rail saddle thanks to our new patent pending attachment system. It is a breeze to mount and once in place, it stays in place. When not in use, it can be folded up and stored underneath your seat, ready to be deployed the next time you are caught out in a shower. The new design has also resulted in a more durable product that is less sensitive to wear and tear. So whether you're urban shredding, winter training or just prefer to keep your behind unsoiled, the Ass Saver is your new best friend!

description:
The X-GUARD is a universal mudguard for any wheel size. It is attached using two straps on the lower bar, so fat bikes and bicycles with oversized tyres in particular can rest assured of absolute all-around mud protection. It also protects E-MTB batteries from dirt, splashes and flying rocks. The straps are extra long and can be shortened as needed, making X-GUARD suitable for any frame shape and all commonly marketed battery models.

title: Fixture
description: The Fixture's™ confident mountain style and breezy ventilation combine in a compact design that complements nearly any ride„especially when there's dirt under the tread. Some of our best features, like In-Mold construction coupled with the ease and comfort of our acclaimed Roc Loc® Sports fit system, offer the versatility you need to ride everything from fire-road adventures to swooping singletrack trails. This is one of the best performance value mountain bike helmets available, with styling and color options that will keep you feeling good mile after mile.

title: C3 Wet Ceramic, Chain lubricant, 120ml
description:
The secret to the C3 Ceramic Wet Chain Lube is its unique ceramic coating that provides incredible durability and long distance performance on all bicycle chains. The innovative formulation in our chain oil also uses Boron Nitride to ensure ultra low friction for ultimate drive chain efficiency, high performance and durability. The waterproof qualities of Muc-Off C3 Ceramic Wet Chain Lube also mean that your drive chain will excel in the harshest of riding conditions.

Looking for long chain oil service intervals and precision gear changes with super low friction reduction? Look no further. C3 Ceramic Wet Lube is packaged in an ergonomic bottle complete with pipette system for easy use and application. It’s also 95% biodegradable and is ideal for Road, Cyclocross and MTB.

title: Dry Lube - 60 ml-2oz
description:
Finish Line's Dry Lube goes on wet and sets up with a dry 'wax-like' synthetic film that helps keep your chain clean by not absorbing excessive amounts grit, grime, or dust. Thanks to the added Teflon™ fluoropolymer, Finish Line's Dry Lube minimizes pedaling friction, repels moisture, and withstands rides up to 100 miles. An extremely versatile lubricant and a perfect choice for many road and off-road cyclists.

Dry Lube is especially recommended for riding on or off-road in dry, dirty, dusty environments, yet it holds up well in moderately wet conditions. Dry Lube can also be used on derailleurs, shifters, cables, and brake pivot points. Finish Line's Dry Lube provides optimum drivetrain efficiency without attracting an excessive amount of abrasive contaminants. This is Finish Line's most popular and versatile lubricant.

title: Kickr Smart bike Trainer
description:
The 2018 Wahoo KICKR Power Trainer is amongst the world’s best indoor bike trainers! This updated version offers more bike compatibility, espacially for bikes with disc-brakes and thru-axles. It also works with the new Wahoo Kickr Climb device, and has become completely silent, for a better overall experience. 

A new larger flywheel was specially engineered by Wahoo to provide riders with a realistic ride feel while training indoors. The Kickr also uses new algorithms to improve responsiveness. 

Pop off your back wheel and mount your bike on the direct drive for a smooth and quiet ride. The KICKR measures power (wattage), speed, distance and cadence. Use your smartphone to control the resistance for structured workouts or virtual course riding. Pain Cave, meet your new best friend.

Improvements:
  • Now virtually silent
  • Enhanced ride responsiveness
  • Enhanced resistance at 2200 watts
  • Larger flywheel gives better road feel

Features:
  • Connected to your smartphone, the interactive Kickr trainer adjusts the resistance via your favorite App
  • Super flywheel engineered to simulate an ultra-realistic road feel
  • Direct power measurement happens at the hub for consistent and calibrated data throughout every grueling mile
  • Adjustable to fit most bikes and foldable legs for easy portability
  • As quiet as the best trainers on the market
  • Firmware is upgradable for better durability
  • Sold complete with 11 speed cassette (Shimano / SRAM compatible)& RPM cadence sensor

  • Kickr trainer
  • 11 speed Sram/Shimano compatible cassette

  • Reversible hub spacer for 130mm and 135mm Quick Release
  • Drive Side Apapter for 12x142 and 12x148 Thru Axle
  • Reversible hub spacer for 12x142 and 12x148 Thru Axle

title: WAHOO Kickr Core
description: The KICKR CORE is the latest in Wahoo's line of smart indoor bike trainers. It delivers a realistic, accurate, and quiet indoor training experience by using the proven flywheel technology and advanced algorithms of Wahoo's legendary indoor bike trainers. The KICKR CORE indoor trainer is built with the durabilty to withstand all of your indoor training sessions and no other brand of smart trainers has more apps and software training options, including Zwift and Trainer Road.

title: Wahoo Kickr Snap
description:
Agony! Now available in a wheel-on design. SNAP makes it easy to turn your regular road or mountain bike into a powerful indoor SmartTrainer. Made from heavy-duty stainless steel and featuring a wide stance, SNAP is designed to keep its feet firmly planted on the floor and your bike securely locked in so you can train with confidence. Like KICKR, SNAP uses your smartphone, tablet or computer to control resistance and provide a reliable power measurement so you can monitor and adjust your intensity


• Key tech, compatibility and specs:
- Wireless Technology: ANT+/ Bluetooth 4.0
- Devices: iOS/Android/PC (Mac/Windows)
- Resistance Type: Electromagnetic
- Accuracy: +/- 5%

title: WAHOO Elemnt Bolt GPS
description:
ELEMNT BOLT is the first, fully aerodynamic GPS bike computer! Its patent pending design creates an integrated system of computer and mount which results in a CFD (Computational Fluid Design) tested, highly aerodynamic system built to be on the front of your bicycle. Equipped with Bluetooth Smart and ANT+ dual-band technology, ELEMNT BOLT pairs seamlessly with all of your cycling sensors. It works with our free ELEMNT companion app which allows you to set up your data fields, customize profiles, track performance, and share ride data effortlessly - no more confusing menus! Plus, programmable LED QuickLook Indicators provide a quick way to see if you're on pace with important performance metrics like speed, heart rate, and power. Designed for performance and engineered for simplicity - the ELEMNT BOLT GPS bike computer helps make every second count.

  • Physical Dimensions: 2.9" x 1.8" x 0.87" (74.6mm x 47.3mm x 22.1mm)
  • Display Size: 2.2"" (56mm)
  • Weight: 2.2 oz
  • Battery: USB rechargeable
  • Battery Life: 15 hours
  • Waterproof Rating: IPX7 (waterproof up to 5 ft)
  • Supported Satellites: GPS, GLONASS, BEIDOU Galileo, and QZSS
  • Operating Temperature: -4°F to 122°F / -20°C to 50°C

title: Electric Queen Framset
description:
This bike was expressly made for maximum fun. It had to be gravity capable, climb like a banshee, cruise across town, encourage you to play and launch off of every obstacle, and slay single track like no other. It was a laundry list of hopes and dreams and hot dang do we feel like this shred sled delivers on all fronts.

Behold the fruits of our labor: The Electric Queen. The ultimate “Trail” hardtail. Short wheelbase, aggressive trail geometry, 120mm suspension fork, and fits 27.5 x 3.0” or 29 x 2.25” tires.

If the Log Lady was our love song to the hardcore single track single speeders, this is the encore dedicated to those who want to destroy everything in their path and send it off of everything in sight.

It features the modern suite of mountain standards: stealth dropper routing, Boost spacing, thru-axles, 44mm head tube, and because we’re All-City, two bottle mounts.

New for this second offering of Electric Queen are framesets. We've built a superb segmented rigid fork to compliment the steel frame, and are including that with the frames. If you bought a complete and also want a rigid fork, no worries, painted to match forks will be available in both the cyan splatter and the original yellow/pink fade splatter. 

If you’re looking for a bike that can handle hardcore trail riding, doesn’t mind the dirt jumps, is actually fun to pedal around on, and doesn’t require the maintenance or hassle of a full suspension rig, the Electric Queen is an awesome choice.

*Geo is given at 25% sag*

title: Topstone 105
description:
With something of a do-it-all mentality, the Cannondale Topstone105 Disc Adventure Bikes is ready for intrepid souls to go explore roads less travelled. Alternatively, it's no less capable of hacking through traffic and acting as a durable, robust and reliable commuting bike. Ride to the office during the week and ride to the hills when the weekend rolls around. Kitted out with trusted Shimano 105 components with plenty of gears to tackle long tough climbs and with enough space in the frame for tyres up to 42mm wide, this bike will eat up the gravel miles.

The geometry feels stable and controlled, but with a slight raciness akin to the endurance road bikes in the Cannondale range, so there's a keenness to ride fast when required. And when you need to strap on your bikepacking gear there are multiple bottle cage positions plus mounts on the top tube, so that all your kit is always where you need it.

FEATURES

  • Built with plenty of room for tyres up to 42mm wide, for comfort, grip and adventurous capability
  • A slack head angle paired with a long 55mm fork rake delivers great stability at speed
  • Multiple bottle cage positions on the downtube mount let you configure for big frame bags
  • Full carbon fork, with tapered steerer and 12mm thru-axle

title: Arcade 21"
description: Totally re-deisgned for 2019, this year's Arcade now features full sealed bearings throughout and an injection of brand new hardware. This dialled machine now rolls on SALT's super wide 36mm Valon rims and sealed EX hubs with SALTPLUS Burn tires, making for an incredibly durable and dependable wheelset and tire combo

title: Curse 20”
description:
One of the most anticipated bikes in BMX, the CRS is a bike we are proud to have the WETHEPEOPLE stamp of approval on. Featuring an ECLAT aftermarket parts injection including the "Bios" Pivotal seat and “Pure” seat clamp, the CRS also packs plenty of aftermarket goodness from SALT including a fully sealed Salt (AM) cassette hub, the new Salt (Fraction) rims. The geometry of the CRS has been tailored specifically to allow younger riders to be able to progress quicker, including short 12.75” chainstays, 26mm offset fork and 165mm cranks, giving the CRS a responsive and snappy ride. One of the most well-engineered entry-level bikes on the market, the CRS is a bike built with vision.

SPECIFICATIONS

  • Frame: 4130 crmo down tube, 1020 hi-ten
  • Fork: SALT “AM 20” fork, 1020 hi-ten , 4130 crmo steerer, 26mm offset
  • Bars: SALT "CRS 20" bar, 1020 hi-ten
  • Grips: SALT "EX" 154mm flangeless grips
  • Stem: SALT “PRO” top load stem, 50mm reach
  • Headset: SALT “PRO” int. headset, sealed bearing

  • Pedals: ÉCLAT “SURGE” nylon/fiberglass pedals
  • Chain: SALT “AM” chain, Z1 type
  • Sprocket SALT “GATEWAY” steel 25t sprocket

With Éclat (Surge) plastic pedals, a crmo down tube frame, a fully sealed Salt cassette hub and the NEW Salt (Tracer) 18” tires - the CRS 18” has never been so dialed.

18-inch BMX to best suit kids in the age bracket of - 6 to 10 years with a height range of 120cm to 150cm.

title: Masi Speciale Otto Steel
description:
Online exclusive

The Speciale Otto finds the ultimate sweet spot between style and functionality. The versatile, light and responsive M4130 Chromoly frame and fork rolls out on Brev.M 28mm deep race rims and 27c Kenda Kontender tires to offer superior grip and precision handling. Equipped with a simple Shimano 8 speed drivetrain and Brev.M contact points, the Speciale Otto is a stylish street shredder that can also the distance.

 

  • Constructed from Chromoly tig welded tubing, with standard road dropouts

  • New Brev. M riser bar w/ 10mm rise
  • 28mm deep Brev. M rims & alloy hubs

  • Shimano Claris 1x8 drivetrain keeps shifting simple
  • New Brev. M riser bar w/ 10mm rise

title: Norco Scene 2
description:
The Norco Scene is not another hybrid re-run.

Rated ‘R’ for rad, the Scene’s modern spin on the upright, hybrid bike will have you doing a double take. Don’t let the step-thru design throw you – it’s all part of the Scene’s laid-back personality, offering casual convenience for all – especially when hauling heavy loads like kids’ seats and trail-a-bikes. Not one to be typecast, the Scene is perfect for family rides, cruising with the crew, or quick trips to refill a growler. And with inspiration from Norco mountain bikes – such as 1by drivetrains and 650B wheels with large volume tires – the Scene is a real showstopper.

title: Projekt 8
description:
D Street Projekt 8

Online - special order only

This bike starts with the simplicity of a single-speed, then dials up the versatility a notch with 8 terrain conquering speeds from Shimano with a Tektro 315 dual-pivot caliper rear brake. It sports a riser bar that has a 15mm rise and a 680mm width. Alloy 32-hole rims keep things light, stainless steel spokes keep things clean, Kenda 700x28c tires keep things smooth. Like all D Streets, the Projekt 8 is elegant and understated. If flies straight and true, just like you...

FEATURES

  • D-Street steel urban road-frameset with vertical dropouts
  • Forged Alloy 3 piece crank with a 44t chainring
  • Shimano Altus rear derailleur with 8-speed cassette and an Acera Rapidfire Plus shifter
  • Oversize Alloy riser handlebar with 7° rise A-head stem
  • 40mm aero double-wall rims with a cassette rear hub and stainless steel spokes
  • Kenda 700 X 28mm tires

title: Quick Neo SL 2
description:
Meet the strong and silent type on two wheels. This pedal assisted e-bike is fun and functional, opening up a whole realm of possibilities in your urban empire. The sleek design wraps the most marvellous components of this bike - the MAHLE drive unit and battery in the rear hub and the down tube. Result? A bike that just looks like a bike. Except it's got extra pop when you're toting your toddler to daycare, or setting out on a longer weekend tour. Disc brakes keep you in control, and its smooth tires are cruisey and cushioned on the pavement.

  • Smartform C3 alloy frame is strong and light, with a full carbon fork to dampen vibrations from the road.
  • Geometry supports you in an efficient pedalling and upright position.
  • MAHLE ebikemotion X35 drive unit provides pedal assist with little noise, low resistance, and good pedal support.
  • Modes include ON, OFF, WALK, and LIGHT so you can choose your level of pedal assist.
  • Integrated design conceals the motor drive in the rear hub and the battery in the down tube.
  • Intellimount stem lets you use your smartphone with your app of choice on the go.
  • Shimano Altus shifter and derailleur opens access to 9 speeds.
  • Shimano UR300 hydraulic disc brakes provides reliable all-weather control.
  • Schwalbe Energizer Plus tires in 700 x 38C keep things smooth and comfy on the road.
  • Frame includes rack and fender mounts.
  • Optional extra batteries can extend your range up to 250km (sold separately).
  • Included: MAHLE ebikemotion X35 charger, Herman H Trace rear light and Cannondale wheel sensor.

title: Fuji Stroll
description:
Made for urban riders seeking the simplicity and lightweight of a fixed-gear in a fashion-forward package, combined with the aggressive positioning and speed of a classic track bike for swiftly and adeptly weaving in and out of crowded city streets. Perfect for commuting to work, or simply running errands. Classic paint, flat bars, and simple graphics deliver a clean style.

Specifications

Constructed of custom-butted Elios 2 Chromoly steel that is both lightweight and durable, with solid yet forgiving ride quality. Straight-blade Chromoly fork dampens road vibrations Threaded headset, quill stem, and clamp-on cable guides Ð which provide a cleaner look when riding brakeless Ð lend classic track styling. The simple, single-speed drivetrain is low-maintenance, lightweight, and intuitive to ride. High-flange hubs increase wheel stiffness Rack mounts add carrying capacity.

title: Uno Riser 2020
description:
The perfect bike for no-handed skids, weekend bike polo or just ripping the city streets. The Uno Riser does it all with effortless style and a smile. Now more that ever Fixed is about more options and few limitations, that’s why its equipped with a flip flop hub that allows you to go from fixed gear to freewheel and back again. The riser handlebar delivers stellar handling and control while a wider rim profile accommodates more rubber and superior grip. Live and learn about the endless possibilities of a single gear and take your riding to the next level.

• TIG-welded Chromoly steel frame w/ Masi track horizontal dropouts, braze-on Seatpost clamp & fender eyelets
• Straight blade Chromoly fork
• FSA Looseball 1-1/8” threadless headset
• Forged alloy 3pc track crank (44T), w/ sealed cartridge BB
• Fixed/Free flip-flop rear hub w/ both 16T fixed sprocket & 16T freewheel
• KMC Z410 1/8” chain
• Brev-M 31.8mm riser bar (660mm width) w. Brev-M forged alloy stem
• Masi Classic Road saddle w/ Brev-M micro-adjust alloy seat post
• Brev-M deep-section 40mm aero double-wall alloy rims w/ alloy track hubs, 32H
• Fast, yet comfy Kenda Kwick Kontender 700x30c all-purpose tires
• Tektro R315 long drop brake calipers F&R

title: Supersix Evo Carbon disc 105
description:
CANNONDALE SUPERSIX EVO CARBON 105 ROAD BIKE 2020

Giving access to Cannondale’s latest Super Six at a great price, the EVO Carbon 105 Road Bikes benefits from exactly the same frame design as the rest of the range. This means the wind tunnel developed tube shapes, the integrated cable routing with switch plate, speed release thru-axle and the integrated seat binder which improves the aerodynamics of the bike and allows the seat post to flex a little for greater comfort.

Adorning the impressive frame is Shimano’s 105 11-speed groupset with rim brakes. Providing a wide range of ratios from the 11-30 tooth cassette and 52/36 Cannondale 1 chainset and instant, accurate shifting, the 105 level components benefit from trickle-down technology from higher up the range. Fulcrum 900 wheels and Cannondale finishing kit complete an amazing package.

FEATURES

  • BallisTec Carbon frame with integrated cable routing, space for 30mm tyres
  • Shimano 105 11-speed mechanical groupset
  • Shimano 105 rim brakes
  • Fulcrum Racing 900 wheelset

title: CAAD13 105
description:
Details

This is the speediest, smoothest, best handling, finest performing aluminum race bike on the planet. Cannondale's CAAD13 continues to show racers around the globe that aluminum can be every bit as good as carbon fiber, and in many ways it's even better. Flat mount disc brakes and Shimano's 105 2x11 drivetrain give you ultimate confidence on steep descents with reliable shifting across the range. 12mm thru-axle dropouts add strength and efficiency to the power transfer equation, while internal cable routing and Cannondale's own component group keep the bike sleek and tidy.

Flat mount disc brakes and Shimano's 105 2x11 drivetrain give you ultimate confidence on steep descents with reliable shifting across the range. 12mm thru-axle dropouts add strength and efficiency to the power transfer equation, while internal cable routing and Cannondale's own component group keep the bike sleek and tidy.

title: Seed 16"
description:
The We The People 2019 Seed 16" Bike-Matt Purple is a carefully designed and well-spaced 16” bike, designed to make those first years in the sport as fun as they can possibly be. This scaled-down machine has been lightened up this year to make it as easy as possible for a younger rider to reach their goals. The Seed is packed full of the latest Salt components like a Salt (Junior) 40mm reach stem, and Salt (Tracer) tires as well as being integrated headset and tapered fork. Two fantastic color schemes round off what is without a doubt the best 16” complete bike we’ve ever made

FRAME: 1020 hi-ten frame
TOP TUBE: 16”TT
FORK: SALT “AM 16” fork, 1020 hi-ten, 4130 crmo steerer, 28mm offset

title: Curse, Metalic Purple, 18”
description:
18-inch BMX to best suit kids in the age bracket of - 6 to 10 years with a height range of 120cm to 150cm. 

 

 This stacked 18” machine has everything you could need to ride as hard as you can before you’re ready to move to a full-size BMX bike. The CRS 18” is available in three jaw-dropping colorways, and comes stacked with parts most bikes would dream about having. With Éclat (Surge) plastic pedals, a crmo down tube frame, a fully sealed Salt cassette hub and the Salt (Tracer) 18” tires - the CRS 18” has never been so dialed

title: Curse 20”
description:
One of the most anticipated bikes in BMX, the CRS is a bike we are proud to have the WETHEPEOPLE stamp of approval on. Featuring an ECLAT aftermarket parts injection including the "Bios" Pivotal seat and “Pure” seat clamp, the CRS also packs plenty of aftermarket goodness from SALT including a fully sealed Salt (AM) cassette hub, the new Salt (Fraction) rims. The geometry of the CRS has been tailored specifically to allow younger riders to be able to progress quicker, including short 12.75” chainstays, 26mm offset fork and 165mm cranks, giving the CRS a responsive and snappy ride. One of the most well-engineered entry-level bikes on the market, the CRS is a bike built with vision.

SPECIFICATIONS

  • Frame: 4130 crmo down tube, 1020 hi-ten
  • Fork: SALT “AM 20” fork, 1020 hi-ten , 4130 crmo steerer, 26mm offset
  • Bars: SALT "CRS 20" bar, 1020 hi-ten
  • Grips: SALT "EX" 154mm flangeless grips
  • Stem: SALT “PRO” top load stem, 50mm reach
  • Headset: SALT “PRO” int. headset, sealed bearing
  • Gyro: no / holes for removable gyro tabs
  • Lever: SALT “AM” alloy brake lever
  • Brakes: SALTPLUS “Geo XL” alloy u-brake rear
  • Cranks: SALT “ROOKIE” tubular 3pc crank crmo 165mm, 8 Spline
  • BB: SALT “MID” 19mm, press fit, sealed bearing
  • Pedals: ÉCLAT “SURGE” nylon/fiberglass pedals
  • Chain: SALT “AM” chain, Z1 type
  • Sprocket SALT “GATEWAY” steel 25t sprocket
  • Driver: 9t, 1pc cassette driver, sealed bearing
  • Front Hub: SALT “AM” alloy hub, loose ball 3/8”s axle, 36h
  • Rear Hub: SALT “AM” cassette hub, full sealed, 9t, 14mm axle, 36h
  • Front Rim: SALT “FRACTION” rim, straight single wall, 36h
  • Rear Rim: SALT “FRACTION” rim, straight single wall, 36h
  • Seat: ECLAT “BIOS” Mid padded pivotal seat
  • Seat Post: SALT "AM" pivotal seat post
  • Seat Clamp: ÉCLAT “PURGE” 6061-T6 forged alloy seat clamp
  • Tires: SALT “TRACER” 2.35" front & rear
  • Weight: 12.00kg / 26.45lbs

title: Nova 20"
description: A short 20” toptube and 13.2” chainstay keeps the Nova nimble and easy to maneuver for first time riders, and the 25-9 gearing, and mid padded combo seat give it the same feel as our PRO level bikes. You’ll be hard pressed to find a bike that packs as much bang for your buck as the Nova.

description:
WTP's Pivotal seat post with an integrated 17mm socket. If you're ever in a jam and need to remove your wheel the Socket post has you covered.
  • 3D forged 6061-T6 alloy pivotal system compatible seat post
  • Integrated 17mm socket function

title: B17
description: The B17 saddle, intended for the touring and trekking cyclist, has been our best selling model for over a century. First introduced in the 1890s, the B17 has survived virtually unchanged and has firmly established itself as the saddle of choice for long-distance cyclists.

title: B17 Short
description:
Her Standard

The B17 is our flagship model, ideal for long-distance sports touring, trekking and atb use. It has been on the market for over 100 years, being featured in as early as the 1898 catalog. The model is available for gents and ladies: the B17 (gents) and B17 S (ladies). The Standard models feature black steel rails, the B17 Special features copper plated steel metalwork.

title: B17 Special
description:
A Crowning Achievement

The B17 is our flagship model, ideal for long-distance sports touring, trekking and mtb use. It has been on the market for over 100 years, being featured in as early as the 1898 catalog. The model is available for gents and ladies: the B17 (gents) and B17 S (ladies). The Standard models feature black steel rails, the B17 Special features copper plated steel metalwork, and the B17 Titanium/ Both the B17 Special and the Titanium also feature hand-hammered copper rivets.

This saddle is handmade in England and is guaranteed for 2 years from the date of purchase.
A 10-year extended warranty will be awarded after you have registered this product at www.brooksengland.com/forever

title: Flyer Special
description:
The flyer is a classically sprung saddle for long-distance trekking and touring. It is directly descending from the B66 Champion, first featured in the 1927 catalog. Sharing the same leather tops of the B17 models.

Features:
  • Classic- lifetime comfort, shapes to your body, cool in hot weather
  • 2 coil springs at the rear adds additional comfort on rough terrain

title: Flyer Special Short
description:
Durable Comfort for Her

The Flyer and its ladies model Flyer S are classically sprung saddles for long distance trekking and touring. It is directly descending from the B66 Champion, first featured in the 1927 catalogue. Sharing the same leather tops of the B17 models, they combine the comfort of these popular models with the extra suspension granted by two rear springs. Both are available with tubular steel rivets or with hand hammered copper rivets under the names of Flyer Special and Flyer S Special

title: SPECIALIZED Specialized Centro Mips Helmet
description:
Desirable features, certified protection, and casual styling—these are the hallmarks of the Centro helmet. It's intended for commuters and city riders, and it features an easy-to-use, one-size fit system, an in-molded shell for lightweight protection, and all around reflective webbing to help increase your visibility to motorists in low-light conditions. You'll also find that it's equipped with next-level protection courtesy of revolutionary MIPS technology (Multi-Directional Impact Protection System).

Fit system is ANGi crash sensor ready.

MIPS-equipped.

One-size system, designed for easy and accurate fit to a wide range of head sizes.

Headset SX fit system with micro-adjustable dial for easy, secure, and accurate fit.

4th Dimension Cooling System optimizes ventilation.

In-molded shell improves strength and reduces weight.

Tri-Fix web splitter for improved comfort and ease of strap adjustments.

All around reflective webbing and decals for increased visibility to motorists in low-light conditions.

Patented clip-on visor included.

Lock compatible rear vent accepts both cable and U-locks to deter theft.
